Package cycling

Class Rider

java.lang.Object
cycling.Rider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Rider extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a single rider team value will be set as -1 when the rider is not associated with a team
See Also:

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the Rider, should not be null or empty
      Returns:
      String of the name of the race

    • setName

      public void setName(String newName)
      Sets the name of the Rider - should not be null or empty
      Parameters:
      newName - String new name that abides by rules of name

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Gets the ID of rider, each rider should have a unique ID
      Returns:
      int unique ID of rider

    • setID

      public void setID(int newId)
      Sets ID of rider, should be unique and only be set at rider creation to avoid issues
      Parameters:
      newId - unique int ID number to identify rider

    • getRaces

      public ArrayList<Integer> getRaces()
      Gets an arraylist of IDs of races that the rider has competed in
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Integer values, each the ID of a race

    • setRaces

      public void setRaces(ArrayList<Integer> newRaces)
      Sets the list of races the rider has competed in
      Parameters:
      newRaces - ArrayList of Integers, each the ID of a race

    • getTeam

      public int getTeam()
      Gets the ID of the team the rider is associated with Value of -1 if the rider is not associated with a team
      Returns:
      int ID of associated team or -1 if not associated with a team

    • setTeam

      public void setTeam(int newTeam)
      Sets the ID of the team the rider is associated with. Riders can only be associated with 1 team at a time
      Parameters:
      newTeam - int ID value of team that the rider is associated with

    • getBirth

      public int getBirth()
      Gets year of riders birth
      Returns:
      int greater than 1900

    • setBirth

      public void setBirth(int newBirth)
      Sets the year of the riders birth. Should not be less than 1900
      Parameters:
      newBirth - int greater than 1900
